pageProduct.name: Oapl Travel Socks Medium Beige
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Clinically Proven to Reduce Risk of DVT

Reduce swelling.
Improve Circulation.
Reduce risk of Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT)
Latex Free
76% Nylon
24% Lycra
Spandex

DVT can be prevented - Wearing OAPL Travel Socks during flight can reduce the likelihood of DVT forming by improving circulation. OAPL Travel Socks should be worn continuously whilst travelling. Creasing or rolling of the stocking during wear must be avoided.

Size 
Small - Calf - 11.5"-14.50" (30-37cm) Length - Up to 15.75" (Up to 40cm)
Medium - Calf - 13"-15.50" (33-39cm) Length - Up to 15.5" (Up to 42cm)
Large - Calf - 14.5"-17.50" (37-44cm) Length - Up to 17.5" (Up to 45cm)
X-Large - Calf - 17.5"-19.50" (44-50cm) Length - Up to 19" (Up to 48cm)
